text:
@TMobile @Tesla I remember when @TmobileTuesdays had GREAT freebies....now?!? Guess they are 1 of the casualties of #COVID19 

Plus: MAJOR swag should be sent 2 LONGTERM LOYAL customers!(BTW kudos Tmobile for fixing unauth phone prob...only took 6mo 2 fix & a "U suck" campaign on twitter!
